addPaymentAggregatorUser(address).details: Trigers to add contract address to payment aggregator users address set

params._user: Payment aggregator user smart contract address

checkSettlementWindow(uint256).details: Internal function to check if settlement payment is within available timeline

params.targetTime: target time for settlement of time slot

returns._0: Boolean if slot within the settlement window

getTimeSlotByDate(address,address,bytes3.details: Returns the time slot between parties using slot id.

getTimeSlotBySlotId(address,address,byte.details: Returns the time slot between parties using slot id.

getTimeSlotPaymentConfirmation(address,a.details: Returns the time slot between parties using slot id.

getTimeSlotPaymentConfirmationById(addre.details: Returns the time slot between parties using slot id.

isPaymentAggregatorUser(address).details: Trigers to check if provided `addr` is a payment aggregator user from address set

params._user: Contract address to check if it's a payment aggregator user

isSettled(address,address,bytes32,uint25.details: Triggers settlement status of the time slot

registerPayments(address,address,bytes32.details: Triggered to add new payments for a deal

params.ccy: Main settlement currency in a deal
params.payments0: Array of cashflows owed by the first party
params.payments1: Array of cashflows owed by the second party
params.timestamps: Array of timestamps for timeslot identification

removePaymentAggregatorUser(address).details: Trigers to remove payment aggregator user from address set

params._user: Payment aggregator user smart contract address

removePayments(address,address,bytes32,b.details: Triggered to remove existing payments for a deal

params.ccy: Main settlement currency in a deal
params.payments0: Array of cashflows owed by the first party
params.payments1: Array of cashflows owed by the second party
params.timestamps: Array of timestamps for timeslot identification

setCloseOutNetting(address).details: Trigers to set close out netting smart contract

setMarkToMarket(address).details: Trigers to set mark to market smart contract

verifyPayment(address,address,bytes32,ui.details: External function to verify payment by msg.sender, uses timestamp to identify TimeSlot.

devdoc.title: Payment Aggregator contract is used to aggregate payments between counterparties in bilateral relationships. Those payments are defined per counterparties addresses (packed into one bytes32), main settlement currency and payment date. Contract linked to all product based contracts like Loan, Swap, etc.

addPaymentAggregatorUser(address).notice: Trigers only be contract ownerReverts on saving 0x0 address

methods.constructor: sets contract deployer as owner of this contract

removePaymentAggregatorUser(address).notice: Trigers only be contract ownerReverts on removing non-existing payment aggregator user

setCloseOutNetting(address).notice: Trigers only be contract ownerReverts on saving 0x0 address

setMarkToMarket(address).notice: Trigers only be contract ownerReverts on saving 0x0 address
